name: Sheet Music Trainer Bass
description:
Learn how to read sheet music.

This is the second game in a series of applications that will help you become an expert in sight reading.

Play this game for five minutes a day for a week and you'll become a sight reading expert for the bass scale.

Choose from four different exercises to work on your sight reading

- Bass 101: Learn by listening
- Bass 102: Recognize the notes
- Bass 103: Match the notes to their key
- Bass 104: Catch the notes

Complete all four sections to become a maestro.

For extra fun: challenge your other musician friends to beat your scores.

Enjoy improving your music skills.



Visit WWW.BIDBOX.COM for more great apps

**********************************************************
WE SUPPORT TEACHERS: If you're a music teacher simply send an email to apps@bidbox.com with the subject line "Sheet Music Trainer Bass" and a short description of where you teach to get a redemption code for this game.
**********************************************************
